SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

jhave.core
Interface TransactionCodes

All Known Implementing Classes:
NetworkEvent
public interface TransactionCodes

Interfaces that contains all the constants for client - server transactions.

Key:

  • (type object) - Mandatory to be sent with the transaction code.
  • [type object] - Optional to be sent with the transcation code.
  • | - Seperates transactions. All transactions after first do not contain the transaction code.
  • (String1) (String2) - The space between sent Strings implies " ".

    Version:
    1.1 Revision History: Version 1.0: -Original Version Version 1.1: -Added: LOG_MESSAGE -Added: FS_ERROR_EXISTING_DATASET_NOT_VALID_FOR_REQUESTED_ALGORITHM
    Author:
    Chris Gaffney

    Field Detail

    LOG_MESSAGE

    static final int LOG_MESSAGE
    -115 (Message) Specifies that a message was sent internally and should be logged.

    This code should be sent to log message that are not normally fired by the client. These events include downloading algorithm lists and input generators, which do not normally fire an NetworkEvent.

    Since:
    1.1
    See Also:
    Constant Field Values

    FC_CONNECT_TO_SERVER

    static final int FC_CONNECT_TO_SERVER
    1 (String category) | (Vector algorithmList) Requests a connection to the server.

    This is the first code sent to the server to request an available connect slot. Along with the connection code the client sends the category of algorithms used. Followed after the transaction with the code and category type the client a second transaction is sent to the server. This transaction contains a Vector containing the Algorithm objects created by downloading the list of available algorithms.

    In response to: None
    Confirmation for: FS_LOGIN_CONFIRMATION
    Denial for: FS_LOGIN_DENIAL

    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    FS_LOGIN_CONFIRMATION, FS_LOGIN_DENIAL, Constant Field Values

    FC_PONG

    static final int FC_PONG
    2 [String message] Response to a ping from the server.

    Pings are sent periodically from the server, approximatly every 4 minutes from last ping. The server uses pings to make sure the client is still connected. If FC_PONG is not received 5 minutes after the last ping from the server, the server will close the socket connection with the client, ending all transactions.

    In response to: FS_PING
    Confirmation for: None
    Denial for: None

    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    FC_REQUEST_PING, FS_PING, Constant Field Values

    FC_REQUEST_PING

    static final int FC_REQUEST_PING
    -99 [String message] Requests the server to Ping the Client.

    Requests that the server sends a ping to the client. It then follows the ping process.

    In response to: None
    Confirmation for: FS_PING
    Denial for: None

    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    FC_PONG, FS_PING, Constant Field Values

    FC_REQUEST_STATIC_SCRIPT

    static final int FC_REQUEST_STATIC_SCRIPT
    3 (String algorithm.GetAlgoName) Requests a static script to be sent to the Client.

    Requests that a static (non-generated) script be sent from the server. The server will then send the script along with FS_SEND_STATIC_SCRIPT or tell the client that an error has occured (FS_ERROR_GETTING_STATIC_SCRIPT).

    In response to: None
    Confirmation for: None
    Denial for: None

    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    FS_SEND_STATIC_SCRIPT, FS_ERROR_GETTING_STATIC_SCRIPT, Constant Field Values

    FC_REQUEST_GENERATED_SCRIPT

    static final int FC_REQUEST_GENERATED_SCRIPT
    4 (Algorithm algorithm.GetAlgoName()) ("old" or "new") (String parameters) Requests the server to generate a script and send it to the client.

    Requests a generated script from the server. The script can either be one generated before hand by specifying "old" or a newly generated script ("new").

    In response to: None
    Confirmation for: None
    Denial for: None

    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    FS_SEND_GENERATED_SCRIPT, FS_ERROR_GETTING_GENERATED_SCRIPT, FS_ALGORITHM_NEEDS_INPUT, FS_ERROR_EXISTING_DATASET_NOT_VALID_FOR_REQUESTED_ALGORITHM, Constant Field Values

    FC_SUBMIT_ANSWER_TO_QUESTION

    static final int FC_SUBMIT_ANSWER_TO_QUESTION
    5 (String algorithm.GetAlgoName()) (String question ID) (String answer) Submits the students answer to an asked question to the server.

    First string is that returned by an Algorithm GetAlgoName() method. The second is the questions ID Number. The third token is the answer given by the student.

    In response to: None
    Confirmation for: None
    Denial for: None

    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    FS_EVALUATED_QUESTION, FS_FINAL_RESULTS_TO_QUIZ_AND_LAST_QUESTION, Constant Field Values

    In response to: FC_CONNECT_TO_SERVER

    In response to: FC_CONNECT_TO_SERVER

    In response to: FC_REQUEST_PING or Servers ping rotation

    Denial for: None

    FC_REQUEST_PING, FC_PONG, Constant Field Values

    FS_SEND_STATIC_SCRIPT

    static final int FS_SEND_STATIC_SCRIPT
    300 (String scriptName) (String visualizer) | (String script) Server sends a static (non-generated) to the client.

    In response to: FC_REQUEST_STATIC_SCRIPT
    Confirmation for: FC_REQUEST_STATIC_SCRIPT
    Denial for: None

    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    FC_REQUEST_STATIC_SCRIPT, FS_ERROR_GETTING_STATIC_SCRIPT, Constant Field Values

    FS_ERROR_GETTING_STATIC_SCRIPT

    static final int FS_ERROR_GETTING_STATIC_SCRIPT
    301 [String reason] [String scriptName] [String message] An error occured while trying to retrieve the Script.

    The error most likly means that the algorithm you requested is not available on the server you are connected to. More information is sent with the code.

    In response to: FC_REQUEST_STATIC_SCRIPT
    Confirmation for: None
    Denial for: FC_REQUEST_STATIC_SCRIPT

    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    FC_REQUEST_STATIC_SCRIPT, FS_SEND_STATIC_SCRIPT, Constant Field Values

    FS_SEND_GENERATED_SCRIPT

    static final int FS_SEND_GENERATED_SCRIPT
    400 (String scriptName) (String visualizer) | (String script) Server sends a generated script to the client.

    If the generated script needs more input then the server will send back FS_ALGORITHM_NEEDS_INPUT to the client. The client should then start a InputGenerator to collect information from the user and finally re-request the script with parameters taken from the input generator.

    In response to: FC_REQUEST_GENERATED_SCRIPT
    Confirmation for: FC_REQUEST_GENERATED_SCRIPT
    Denial for: None

    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    FC_REQUEST_GENERATED_SCRIPT, FS_ERROR_GETTING_GENERATED_SCRIPT, FS_ALGORITHM_NEEDS_INPUT, FS_ERROR_EXISTING_DATASET_NOT_VALID_FOR_REQUESTED_ALGORITHM, Constant Field Values

    FS_ALGORITHM_NEEDS_INPUT

    static final int FS_ALGORITHM_NEEDS_INPUT
    401 [String message] Specifys that the given input is not enough to generated the algorithm.

    Afters receiving this the client should load an InputGenerator to collect needed input from the student.

    In response to: FC_REQUEST_GENERATED_SCRIPT
    Confirmation for: None
    Denial for: FC_REQUEST_GENERATED_SCRIPT

    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    FC_REQUEST_GENERATED_SCRIPT, FS_SEND_GENERATED_SCRIPT, FS_ERROR_GETTING_GENERATED_SCRIPT, FS_ERROR_EXISTING_DATASET_NOT_VALID_FOR_REQUESTED_ALGORITHM, Constant Field Values

    FS_ERROR_GETTING_GENERATED_SCRIPT

    static final int FS_ERROR_GETTING_GENERATED_SCRIPT
    402 [String reason] An error occured while trying to generate the script, possibly the script is not available on the server.

    In response to: FC_REQUEST_GENERATED_SCRIPT
    Confirmation for: None
    Denial for: FC_REQUEST_GENERATED_SCRIPT

    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    FC_REQUEST_GENERATED_SCRIPT, FS_SEND_GENERATED_SCRIPT, FS_ALGORITHM_NEEDS_INPUT, FS_ERROR_EXISTING_DATASET_NOT_VALID_FOR_REQUESTED_ALGORITHM, Constant Field Values

    FS_ERROR_EXISTING_DATASET_NOT_VALID_FOR_REQUESTED_ALGORITHM

    static final int FS_ERROR_EXISTING_DATASET_NOT_VALID_FOR_REQUESTED_ALGORITHM
    404 [String message] The dataset that was last used is not valid for the requested algorithm. This is most likely an error on the part of the client, aswell the message is simply informative as the server treats the dataset as being a new dataset when generating the script.

    In response to: FC_REQUEST_GENERATED_SCRIPT
    Confirmation for: None - is Error
    Denial for: None - is informative

    Since:
    1.1
    See Also:
    FC_REQUEST_GENERATED_SCRIPT, FS_SEND_GENERATED_SCRIPT, FS_ALGORITHM_NEEDS_INPUT, FS_ERROR_GETTING_GENERATED_SCRIPT, Constant Field Values

    FS_NO_QUIZ_IN_DATABASE

    static final int FS_NO_QUIZ_IN_DATABASE
    405 [String message] An error occured while trying to access the request quiz, possibly the quiz is not on this server.

    In response to: Unknown
    Confirmation for: None
    Denial for: Unknown

    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Constant Field Values
